createTopic(String) - Method in class cps.mouradalpha.components.Broker
Create a topic by adding it to the list topics. the part that is responsible for the creation is synchronized hence only one thread can this method at the same time. once the topic is created it notify the other brokers.
createTopic(String) - Method in class cps.mouradalpha.connectors.ConnectorManagementCI
calling the inbound port with the corresponding offered method.

createTopic(String) - Method in class cps.mouradalpha.ports.InBoundPortManagement
calls the service method (createTopic) of the owner component (Broker) by executing a task using one of the component's threads.
createTopic(String) - Method in class cps.mouradalpha.ports.OutBoundPortManagement
create a specific topic by calling the server component (Broker) through the connector that implements the required interface.
createTopic(String[]) - Method in class cps.mouradalpha.components.Broker

CVMBasic - Class in cps.mouradalpha
The class CVMBasic implements the single JVM assembly for our project We have a Publisher, a Subscriber and a Broker in the middle providing its services for them.
CVMBasic() - Constructor for class cps.mouradalpha.CVMBasic
 
CVMBasic2Broker - Class in cps.mouradalpha
The class CVMBasic2Broker implements the single JVM for our project, the idea is to have two brokers, one publisher and one subscriber.
CVMBasic2Broker() - Constructor for class cps.mouradalpha.CVMBasic2Broker
 
CVMBasicWithPlugins - Class in cps.mouradalpha
The class CVMBasicWithPlugins implements the single JVM assembly for our project, in this example we use plugins for the Publisher and Subscriber with PublisherWithPlugin class and SubscriberWithPlugin.
CVMBasicWithPlugins() - Constructor for class cps.mouradalpha.CVMBasicWithPlugins
 
CVMConcurrence - Class in cps.mouradalpha
The class CVMConcurrence implements the single JVM assembly for our project, in this example we test the concurrency of the Broker with multiple Subscriber and Publisher.
CVMConcurrence() - Constructor for class cps.mouradalpha.CVMConcurrence
